alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Spokane Area; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 10 at 2:51AM PST until November 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Pullman, Pomeroy, Downtown Spokane, Airway Heights, Davenport, Rosalia, Uniontown, Spokane Valley, La Crosse, Cheney, Fairfield, Clarkston, Colfax, Oakesdale, Tekoa, Rockford, and Alpowa Summit. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Spokane Area; Washington Palouse
